data.description:
🏆 The #1 all-in-one VR Sports Game. 

🐐 BECOME THE G.O.A.T 🐐

🎖️ Begin your legacy in BIG BALLERS VR. It's a fully multiplayer game where you can play with up to 10 players per Park and perform crazy windmill contact dunks in basketball, slug dingers in baseball, and clutch it with game-winning touchdown catches. There's even an MR mini-hoop mode and a Blade Ball inspired game mode.

🏈 EASY TO LEARN – HARD TO MASTER ⚾️🏀🏐

Our world-class physics engine gives you realistic natural gameplay while being easy to grasp yet challenging to master.

🗣️ COMMUNITY RUNS DEEP 🗣️

We strongly believe in respect. Earn reputation by playing with good sportsmanship.

💪 FLEX ON YOUR OPPS 💪

With 100s of cosmetics available in our shop, you can make plays in style. Customize with the drippiest hats, jackets, kicks, and accessories.

🥖 FRESH UPDATES MONTHLY 🥖

Expect new content and enhancements every month, tailored to our community's feedback – that includes you 🫵.

😤 WILL YOU RISE TO THE CHALLENGE? 😤

Go big or go home. Play for free now!

changelog.change_log:
- Home Run Derby mode has launched!
- Fixed some edge cases where users could get stuck on the splash screen. Thank you to the community users who have provided details and have worked with our development team directly.
- Quality of Life (QOL) You can now see your Voice Respect Score report from in-game.
- Fixed some cases where certain setting would cause self-mannequin to flicker.
- QOL you can now easily see which items are equipped by a visual checkmark/white border around the item.
- Ranked Matches now require a player to be at least level 10
- MMR Ranks are now shown on the Ranked Screen.
- Some items in-game had their art updated.
- Voice Respect Scores have launched! See in you game report card
- Enhanced the equipping ability to easily see which items are equipped to your character.
